General.Name: Sri Rejeki Isman(Sritex)PT
General.Description: PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk operates as a textile and garment company in Indonesia, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States of America, South America, the United Arab Emirates, Africa, and Australia. The company operates through Spinning, Weaving, Finishing, and Garment segments. It provides yarn to textile factories; greige; finished fabric; and uniforms for military schools, work, safety, and corporate. PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Surakarta, Indonesia. PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Huddleston Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan K.H. Samanhudi No. 88, Surakarta, Indonesia, 57511
